title: Need Red to confirm
body: I heard speculation that Shaco is getting an overhaul in January... Now i really like Shaco as he is now, can we get some confirmation on whether or not this is true so that i can get over it now b4 you get a plethora of Forum posts? Pretty Plz? {{item:3070}} {{champion:35}}

replies.body: how about remove the fking invis or give us the "!" indication like all the other champs

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RltYaQkL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-30T07:18:53.687+0000)
>
> how about remove the fking invis or give us the "!" indication like all the other champs

it shows you a poof when he uses his q. even if you don't have vision, it'll show you the poof. and rengar and elise are the only ones with a ! because theirs last much longer and can be used as a gap closer.

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RltYaQkL,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-31T01:41:25.943+0000)
>
> wait elise has invis?

man I'm so %%%%ing %%%%%%ed, I meant eve.

YhwRenektonYhw is the fake WhyRenektonWhy and he even essentially said "git trolled Reddit nubs".

Don't believe Reddit. Also the real prophet WhyRenektonWhy said a Shaco rework is not coming soon. So...yeah.
